Bounded

Jul 14, 2019

looking for something in a place abandoned long ago opened secret boxes, they are to be buried vulnerabilities, only ever masked eternally, by themselves.

forest of possibilities, unavoidable over earth and under heart a layer, no sights can be erased rememberance of sea grand ending (only scripted) end of passage, or rights, although they had not been granted? trust, not preserved
